title: Am i dumb for saying this ?
body:
Right so,i was just experimenting with random builds and i came to a conclussiom,that Draven running thunderlords is absolutly strong as heck,Im not sure if i was just matched against bad players or i was really lucky but,i managed to go 26/3/5 by building hime like a  normal ADC but with TD.

{{champion:119}} Anyones say on this ?

replies.body: Draven certainly likes to snowball, and the thunderlords proc is good for surprise damage early game. I could see why this would work.
Thunderlords would be a stronger early game and weaker late game, but with the sort of damage draven does per attack, fervor seems pretty useless on him.
The thing is,running Warlords is absolute garbage since its rework IMO,currently i run fervor but as i gave a go to warlords,it seems that its a great ammount of dmg

I can see where it might work, but me personally, I would still run Warlords or whatever it is that gives HP back. Draven is constantly running around to catch axes and freely stacks it up to keep sustaining, the more you sustain, the more adoration and the less likely to die and lose stacks.

But I don't really play Draven that much, I would only play it on a premade that understands you gotta help Draven get those stacks going and helps preventing getting 3-4 manned nonstop
